text: I used to be an actor I was hired and
fired from every soap in New York City
at one point the role that had the most
had the most success was a character on
One Life to Live name - Brennan he's
kind of a kind of a stock character he's
the bad boy who could be fixed but you
know only be fixed by the right woman
kind of kind of thing what I wanted was
to do something very different what I've
been doing I wanted to do something
polar opposite
my name is Forbes March I own and
operate the New York firewood company we
kiln dry package and deliver specialty
firewood down to Manhattan and the
surrounding suburbs predominantly to
restaurants pizza ovens and smoke houses
this is it it's my spot
[Music]
when I have full staff I've 12 to 14
guys now one guy does the cutting and
the priests splitting we have another
person does the Rhys pleading then we
have between two and four people
packaging the wood we have two drivers
and two drivers helpers trucks go very
early in the wintertime they won't get
back to midnight and the truck goes out
again the next morning around 4:30 so
it's a tight turnaround I mean on bad
days I just get myself in the ass days
when no one turns up and all the
equipment breaks down and then I just
look at myself and I'm like dude you're
wearing a tuxedo being paid to present
at the Emmys a few years ago what are
you doing and then there's days like
today when it's just unbelievably
beautiful out it's it's quiet crickets
are out the guys are happy you can't see
the sky and then Hatton the way you can
hear there's two kinds of chicory one
has that really smooth bark and another
one there's this flaky bark I don't
quite understand the difference that the
trees that we get are trees that
couldn't be used for lumber I've got
some great loggers bring the exactly the
logs I want this is a pile of ash just
to my left right here that's what the
restaurants take is a pile of oak I love
maple over here we have a pile of cherry
over there that has a wonderful flavor
it's very smoked it produces a lot of
smoke which isn't great for pizzas but
for meats it's fantastic the smoke has a
cherry flavor and will actually infuse
the food with a cherry flavor it's
fantastic we have a poly Hickory behind
me as well bacon if bacon isn't cooked
over Hickory it's just a pork chop as
far as I'm concerned you know it's funny
I miss everything I've ever done sure
doesn't feel like it suits me on days
when I'm screwing everything up but it's
definitely where I'm at it's it's it's
what I want to be doing my my daughters
though still teases me that this is just
research you know
you
